import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from '../styles.module.css' const Ajoutersujet = () => { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({}) const handleChange = (event: any) => { const titre: any = event.target.titre const contenu = event.target.contenu setInputs((contenus) => ({ ...contenus, [titre]: contenu })) } const handleSubmit = (event: any) => { event.preventDefault() alert(inputs) } return (
